\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,column sep=small]
    {X \otimes (Y \otimes Z)} \& {(X \otimes Y) \otimes Z} \& {Z \otimes (X \otimes Y)} \\
    {(Y \otimes Z)\otimes X} \& {Y \otimes (Z \otimes X)} \& {(Z \otimes X)\otimes Y}
    \arrow["\alpha", from=1-1, to=1-2]
    \arrow["B"', tail reversed, from=1-1, to=2-1]
    \arrow["B", tail reversed, from=1-2, to=1-3]
    \arrow["\alpha", from=1-3, to=2-3]
    \arrow["\alpha", from=2-2, to=2-1]
    \arrow["B", tail reversed, from=2-3, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
